content.text:
## Analysis of the Main Target Image

The main target image shows two building block structures:

### Left Structure (House with Legs):
- Total blocks: 8
- Layers: 4
1. Base layer: Two blue cube blocks as "legs"
2. Second layer: One yellow rectangular block as a "bridge" connecting the legs
3. Third layer: Two blocks side by side (one blue cube and one red cube)
4. Fourth layer: One green rectangular block
5. Top layer: Orange triangular roof (appears to be made of 2 triangular pieces)

### Right Structure (Vehicle/Train):
- Total blocks: 6
- Layers: 4
1. Base layer: Orange cylindrical blocks (2 connected cylinders)
2. Second layer: One green rectangular block
3. Third layer: Two blocks stacked vertically (red cube at bottom, blue cube on top)
4. Top layer: Orange triangular roof (appears to be one triangular piece)

## Selected Blocks from Dictionary

### For Left Structure (House with Legs):
- 1 (Blue cube) - Used 3 times for legs and side wall
- 3 (Red cube) - Used 1 time for side wall
- 6 or 7 (Green rectangular block) - Used 1 time for middle section
- 9 or 10 (Yellow rectangular block) - Used 1 time for bridge section
- 14 and 15 (Orange triangular pieces) - Used for roof (2 pieces)

### For Right Structure (Vehicle/Train):
- 1 (Blue cube) - Used 1 time for upper cube
- 3 (Red cube) - Used 1 time for lower cube
- 7 (Green rectangular block) - Used 1 time for base
- 11 (Orange cylinder) - Used 2 times (or one double cylinder) for wheels
- 16 (Orange triangular piece) - Used 1 time for roof

## Assembly Order Instructions

### Left Structure:
```
{
  Step1: Move block with index 1
  Step2: Move block with index 1
  Step3: Move block with index 9
  Step4: Move block with index 1
  Step5: Move block with index 3
  Step6: Move block with index 7
  Step7: Move block with index 14
  Step8: Move block with index 15
}
```

### Right Structure:
```
{
  Step1: Move block with index 11
  Step2: Move block with index 11
  Step3: Move block with index 7
  Step4: Move block with index 3
  Step5: Move block with index 1
  Step6: Move block with index 16
}
```
